channel.title: Hollywood History on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Hollywood History on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The Ed Sullivan Theater After Colbert: Last Days of a Late-Night Icon
item.description: With ‘The Late Show’ leaving and no new occupant announced, the future of Broadway’s most storied talk show stage is suddenly up in the air.
